name: Earthrend
simple_desc: Inflicts Daze on enemies within a certain area and grants "Bondmate" to the current active character. At the start of the next battle, automatically uses Skill on the character with "Bondmate."
desc:
After using Technique, gains "Bondmate" and inflict Daze on enemies within a certain area for #1[i] second(s). Dazed enemies will not actively attack ally targets.
When switching the active character, "Bondmate" transfers to the current active character. At the start of the next battle, automatically uses Skill 1 time on the character with "Bondmate" without consuming any Skill Points.
